- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.

- [x] Compile the Project - Dependencies installed, TypeScript configured
- [x] Create and Run Task - Use npm scripts (npm start, npm run android, npm run ios)
- [x] Launch the Project - Instructions in README.md
- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete - README.md updated
